pages.text: I know I can survive in this world, but it won't be easy. My first priority should be to find some wood to make tools and a weapon.$(br2)Next, I should gather whatever resources I can and prepare to make a shelter before the sun sets.$(br2)Whatever the night brings, it won't be pleasant.

Oddly enough, I feel like the daytime and nighttime lasts much longer than usual.$(br2)My intuition tells me the day and night cycle is 2 times longer than what it should be...$(br2)$(#158B1D)One day/night cycle in Rebirth of the Night lasts 40 minutes in real-time.

Surviving in this world alone may prove to be a daunting task. I might try and look for others like me to take on this world together as a team.$(br2)$(#158B1D)You can find the Teams tab on the top left corner while accessing the inventory.$(br2)Here you can create a team and invite other players to your team.
